channel.title: CVE Feed for Edit Comments XT -- Edit Comments XT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Edit Comments XT -- Edit Comments XT

item.title: CVE-2021-38336|2024-08-04T01:37:16.540Z -- edit%20comments%20xt -- edit%20comments%20xt
item.description: The Edit Comments XT WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/edit-comments-xt.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
